 
 
 
                                                                                                                      
Interruption of 
Electricity Supply 
Notice is hereby given under Rule 27 of the Electric Power Rules 
That the electricity supply will be interrupted as here under: 
(It is necessary to interrupt supply periodically in order to 
facilitate maintenance and upgrade of power lines to the network; 
to connect new customers or to replace power lines during road 
 construction, etc.) 
NAIROBI REGION 
 
AREA: PARTS OF PARKLANDS 
DATE: Sunday 22.08.2021                                  TIME: 9.00 A.M. – 5.00 P.M. 
 Parklands Arya Girls, High Commission of India Residence, Highridge Girls 
Sec, Wangapala Rd, Parts Iregi Rd, Parts of 4th & 5th Parklands, Diamond 
Plaza, Old Ismailia Highridge Flats, Presidential Escort, Parts of Pramukh 
 Ave & adjacent customers. 
AREA: RING ROAD, PARKLANDS  
DATE: Tuesday 24.08.2021                              TIME: 9.00 A.M. – 5.00 P.M. 
Part of Ring Road Parklands, Shell Petrol Stn, The Mall Westlands, 
 Westlands Square & adjacent customers. 
AREA: SOUTH C 
DATE: Tuesday 24.08.2021                                TIME: 9.00 A.M. - 5.00 P.M. 
Kongoni Pri Sch, Nairobi South Hosp, Razzana Hotel, Kaisungura Est, 
Muhoho Ave, Mow, DCI Training College, Bellevue, Red Cross, DRSRS, 
Mtihani House, Madina Mosque, Dafam, Afraa, Crater Automobiles, Nextgen 
Mall & Apts, Amboseli Est, Bandari Apartments, College of Insurance, Real 
  Est, Auto Express Mombasa Rd, Ole Sereni & adjacent customers. 
AREA: PART OF ARBORETUM 
DATE: Tuesday 24.08.2021                                TIME: 9.00 A.M. - 5.00 P.M. 
Part of Arboretum Drive, State House Girls, Part of Statehouse Rd, Kolobot 
Drive, UoN Confucius Institute, Arboretum, Part of Riverside Drive, Riverside 
Gardens Rd, Prime Bank Riverside, Chase Bank Riverside, Dusitd2, Chiromo 
  Campus, Chiromo Mortuary, ICEA Lion Chiromo Rd & adjacent customers.

 the nearest Kenya Power office
